quote: You heard people say forty was the new thirty and fifty was the new forty and sixty was the new forty-five, but you never heard anybody say eighty was the new anything. Eighty was just eighty.
quote_letters: YOU HEARD PEOPLE SAY FORTY WAS THE NEW THIRTY AND FIFTY WAS THE NEW FORTY AND SIXTY WAS THE NEW FORTY-FIVE BUT YOU NEVER HEARD ANYBODY SAY EIGHTY WAS THE NEW ANYTHING EIGHTY WAS JUST EIGHTY
